EMAILS.TITLE: E-mails

HINT.TITLE: Pay attention to links and buttons in e-mail
HINT.DESC: Links and buttons cointained in e-mails could lead to malicious websites which can steal your data, or download a malicious files that can harm your device. Do not click them, unless you are really sure they are legitimate.

EMAILS.SUBJECT: Subject
EMAILS.ENABLED_TRUE: E-mail is currently active. It will be used when generating e-mail sets.
EMAILS.ENABLED_FALSE: E-mail is currently inactive. It will not be used until it will be activated again.

HINT.TITLE: Phishing signs hints
HINT.DESC: Pay attention to the following signs in the e-mail

LABELS.NO_ITEMS: There are no items to display.
LABELS.ERROR: Error occured while loading data. Please check your request or try again later.

TUTORIAL.TITLE: How to manage sign highlights
TUTORIAL.STEP_1: Start with selecting the correct sign type.
TUTORIAL.STEP_2: Select the part of the e-mail you want to highlight in the body editor.
TUTORIAL.STEP_3: Press 'ADD SIGN HINT' button to add selected sign.
TUTORIAL.STEP_4: Hover over highlighted text, to show the sign type.
TUTORIAL.STEP_5: If you want to remove the highlight, select the desired part of the e-mail and press 'REMOVE SIGN HINT' button.

TUTORIAL.STEP_1: At the beginning you need to enter your username, age and gender. Then hit START to start the game. (We collect these information just for the internal statistics purposes. We dont share them with any third party.)
TUTORIAL.STEP_2: The dots you can see at the top show the number of emails in your gamerun as well as the current email you are working with. Then in the header you can see the email subject, email address of the sender and the arrival date. Below the line thete is the email body.
TUTORIAL.STEP_3: Your objective in this game is to decide, if the email you are seeing is legitimate or a phishing email. At the bottom you will find three buttons. The first one named HINTS can give you advice about signs you need to look for when deciding. The red one marks the e-mail as phishing and the green as a legitimate e-mail.
TUTORIAL.STEP_4: After you are done with marking all of the emails in your gamerun you will see the summary page with your result. There you can see how many emails you marked correctly, how long did it take you to finish the gamerun and lastly the username you used and the date of your gamerun.
TUTORIAL.STEP_5: Below the result summary you can see individual answer to each email. In this detail you can see your answer, how long did it take you to decide and also the average values for the specific email. At the bottom is the correct answer with the email type.
TUTORIAL.STEP_6: If you are not sure, why did you answer incorrectly, or you just want to look at the email detail again press the SHOW DETAIL button. This will open you an email body detail with highlighted parts indicating the phishing signs the email has. To show it hover over it with mouse or press on it on mobile.

PLAY.RESULT_DESC: Thank you for your time. Please help us improve this application by filling a short questionnaire.

SETTINGS.PHISHING_RATIO: Ratio of phishing e-mails in gamerun (%)

VALIDATION.PHISHING_SIGNS: Phishing e-mail has to own at least one sign.
VALIDATION.FORM_ERROR: Check form and fix validation errors.
VALIDATION.AGE_FORMAT: Age has to be in number format.
VALIDATION.AGE_INTERVAL: Age has to be between 10 and 100.

ERRORS.GAMERUN_INIT_ERROR: Couldn't initialize gamerun. Please check if there is enough legitimate and phishing e-mails according to gamerun settings.

DIALOG.DELETE: Do you want to delete selected items ?
